entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:47 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain or snow near midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
